summary: Moomin lore is serious business, this is the stuff I pester my friends with. Also, fuck the haters who ignore the side books,...
caption:
Moomin lore is serious business, this is the stuff I pester my friends with.

Also, fuck the haters who ignore the side books, you’re missing out on the expanded Moomin universe!

In case you’re curious, the newspaper strip is set in Universe B where Moomintroll starts out as a heterosexual British orphan and dates Snorkmaiden instead of Snufkin.

(I hope Tumblr doesn’t shrink this, I’ll include two smaller versions of the whole just in case.)

summary: Fuck yeah. I can’t wait Moominvalley will air next year. It will be the only Moomin version that I’ll watch in English and just...
body:
Fuck yeah. I can’t wait Moominvalley will air next year. It will be the only Moomin version that I’ll watch in English and just because Taron Egerton is Moomintroll’s voice! Oh, and Matt Lucas is Tweety-Woo’s voice, Kate Winslet is Mrs Fillyjonk’s voice and Warwick Davis is Sniff’s voice.

Don’t know if the Groke will be included in this version. I hope she is. But please, no the Lady Of The Cold. She creeped me out when I was kid and she creeps me still.

reblog.comment:

Don’t know if the Groke will be included in this version. I hope she is. But please, no the Lady Of The Cold. She creeped me out when I was kid and she creeps me still.

Don’t know if the Groke will be included in this version. I hope she is. But please, no the Lady Of The Cold. She creeped me out when I was kid and she creeps me still.

blog.name: beaglebabe1
blog.title: The Hide Away
blog.description:
Welcome to my art blog.

My NSFW account: http://shrewgirlafter.tumblr.com

summary: I was up really late last night and didn’t know what to draw, so the first thing that came to my mind was Moomins. I use to...
caption:
I was up really late last night and didn’t know what to draw, so the first thing that came to my mind was Moomins. I use to watch it here in Canada on the French channels when I was a kid. So I drew Sniff… this was my first attempt. I liked him as a kid and I still do. ^_^ I might ink and colour one of these.

Also I have art coming of other shows and comics I enjoyed as a kid. Lots of European stuff. Stay tooned.

Character belongs to Tove Jansson

#moomins #sniff #moominvalley #ToveJansson #Comicsfromaroundtheworld #Finland #Shrewgirl #Beaglebabe1
